attributes.additional_details: I want the Goverment or Parliament too rise the NHS pay by £300 due too their attendance.
attributes.background: I want the Government or Parliament too rise the NHS pay by £3000 so the pressure can ease on them and they can get their self a treat.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
